attributes.action: Establish a panel of enquiry into BBC News programme standards and quality
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC, for many years, enjoyed a worldwide reputation for high quality news  reporting.  These standards have fallen significantly in recent years, especially in those programmes destined for UK television viewers. A review of the standards of News programmes such as Breakfast is urgently required to restore confidence in the BBC's ability to produce serious, informative news and current affairs programmes which licence payers have a right to expect.
